title: CFC: Free VoIP Calls and SMS
creator: IXC Global Inc

extendedInfo.description: THE BEST FREE TEXTING AND CALLING APP FOR ANDROID EXISTS!An incredible voice application, allowing you to call anyone in more than 130 countries around the globe. Absolutely free phone communication and free text sending for everyone.This app is an excellent opportunity to make free calls and send SMS from your Android smartphone almost anywhere worldwide. All phone calls and SMS are already been paid by sponsors and their cost is transformed into some amount of bonuses. To earn bonuses just complete the sponsor offers. It takes only several minutes and is absolutely free of charge. Complete an offer - get bonuses - call or text anywhere free! That's it!The reasons for need to call abroad cannot be counted. Your friend or fiancÃ©e may be far away on a trip and you miss them a lot. You need to consult your friend who is on a business trip abroad and has no time to write emails? Or simply want to call your Mom and tell her you are having a great time?But international roaming may cost quite a sum of money. That is the reason multiple services offer their solutions for this issue, which mainly end with your unexpected expenses and frustration.â¥ The time of constant search and disappointments is over! No more need to search for the best free texting or calling app, install it, compare with the others, find it inconvenient, get frustrated, uninstall and search again! Getting bonuses for completing free offers and spending them the way you like - what method can possible be easier? Free is the best! One of the pleasant features we offer you is a possibility to test our service immediately after registration. We give you 30 bonus points at once, so you can check yourself and acknowledge we offer the best free VoIP calling and texting app possible!â IS IT THE CHEESE IN THE MOUSETRAP? Of course there is nothing free in this world and someone has to pay the bills. Here at CFC those are the sponsor companies. They pre-pay the cost of your phone calls and SMS and this sum is equal to some amount of bonuses. You have to earn bonuses by completing the offers from sponsors. That does not cost you a thing, just several minutes of your time and that's all!The registration and login procedure is easy as never. No frustrating captchas or multiple details you need to provide. You have to specify only email and password and that is all! We are proud for features and benefits:â simple registration and login procedures, just to name some;â a vast list of sponsors with a plethora of bonus offers;â stable coverage in more than 130 countries worldwide;â bright and entertaining smileys to enrich your texting experience.In addition, we provide fully free internal texting feature, enabling our customers to send unlimited texts inside the CFC network. Register with your friends and enable excellent and reliable text messaging service totally free!â HOW DOES IT WORK?You get 30 Bonuses immediately after registration and may spend them at once to make free calls and send SMS worldwide. As 30 are obviously not enough, you may add bonuses to your account on the Information page.Earning bonuses is possible through completing sponsors' offers, which means:â viewing video advertisements, â downloading different apps,â clicking on advertising banners, etc.As you can see, gaining bonuses requires only some free time. Spend several minutes accomplishing offers and you get bonuses to use them on free international calls and SMS! â CFC IS DEVELOPING YOUR DREAMYour support and feedback is what drives us forward, allowing us to develop and implement new features to make our service even more pleasant and convenient! We are grateful for your suggestions and ideas, they are always heartily welcome.Register just now for FREE and check out yourself that CallsFreeCalls is the 100% best solution for communication!

reviews.title: Need more updates
reviews.comment: I love this app, but it needs updates!!!i will only rate it 5*when calling to Pakistan mobile is fixed. And can u please clarify what the calling rate is to diff.countries.because i thought 1credit/1min was the rate.when i first started using the app, that\'s what i thought.i had 30 cred.,16credits etc,my minutes would equal that.now when i have 20,25,50 cred.i can only talk for 3-5min???and the other prob is that after every call,the bal goes negative (-17,-25).the call should end when the credits hit 0.
